contenido.en:
In many religions, worship or prayer is offered to Mary, the mother of Jesus, and various saints. However, Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses believe this practice has no biblical support and diverts attention from the true worship of Jehovah God.

> ‚ÄúWorship Jehovah your God, and serve him only.‚Äù ‚Äî Matthew 4:10

Jesus taught that only Jehovah should be worshiped. He never authorized prayers to his mother or to other deceased faithful individuals.
